LinkItem.internal_link_text: Build Custom Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration Resources
Build Custom Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration Resources

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: PS C:\> $UserName = New-xDscResourceProperty –Name UserName -Type String -Attribute Key PS C:\> $Ensure = New-xDscResourceProperty –Name Ensure -Type String -Attribute Write –ValidateSet “Present”, “Absent” PS C:\> $DomainCredential = New-xDscResourceProperty –Name DomainCredential-Type PSCredential -Attribute Write PS C:\> $Password = New-xDscResourceProperty –Name Password -Type PSCredential -Attribute Write
PS C:\> New-xDscResource –Name Demo_ADUser –Property $UserName, $Ensure, $DomainCredential, $Password –Path ‘C:\Program Files\WindowsPowerShell\Modules’ –ModuleName Demo_DSCModule

PS C:\> $lastLogon = New-xDscResourceProperty –Name LastLogon –Type Hashtable –Attribute Write –Description “For mapping users to their last log on time” PS C:\> Update-xDscResource –Name ‘Demo_ADUser’ –Property $UserName, $Ensure, $DomainCredential, $Password, $lastLogon -Force

LinkItem.internal_link_text: Build Custom Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration Resources
Build Custom Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration Resources
